comprehensive_overview: GraphMap is a software tool for mapping next-generation sequencing data to a reference genome using the graphical FM index (GFM). It is designed to efficiently align large sets of short sequencing reads generated by modern high-throughput sequencing technologies.
core_features:
1. Utilizes graphical FM index (GFM) for efficient read alignment
2. Designed for mapping large sets of short sequencing reads
3. Supports various next-generation sequencing data types
4. High performance and parallel processing capabilities
